resources.string: The party doesn\'t start without us
AV is a section of Media Club. We are in charge of all things event-related, from audio to lights to backstage, no event is complete without us.

CNY is one the most technically diverse events in the year for AV. A wide variety of mics are used such as large diaphragm mics and shotgun mics. Chinese Orchestra and Choir are very demanding in terms of mics so this event serves as a great practice for AV members at the start of the year.

Orientation is arguably the largest event of the year, spanning 4 days. It is a drama-heavy event, which means there are often half a dozen mics on and off stage and poses a great challenge to the sound technician. However, it is also a great event to acquire plenty of CIP and experience.
Cheng Yat is the President of AV. Due to his micro-managing nature, we affectionately call him "mom".
Steve is the Vice President of AV. He is charismatic, funny and most definitely not gay.
Wes is the ex-President of AV. He\'s a great listener and frankly the only normal person in AV. Furthermore, he\'s the only one currently in a relationship.
